reviewText: This set is for keeps and every one of the DVD serves as excellent teaching material for my 6 month old baby and 2 year old toddler.  Fun to watch and keeps them wanting to learn, dance and do just about everything they watch here.  I am really glad I found this set!

Received this item just as described.. almost new, no scratches. Plays well on our DVD, blu-ray player, PS3.. but for some reason, will not play on our Wii console. My son loves this DVD collection.. he learns a lot from all this DVD.

Absolutely an A+ seller!!
Baby Einstein arrived as promised in perfect condition! Great gift for babies or toddlers!  My older Granddaughters (4, 6 & 8 years old) still enjoy listening and dancing to the music of The Masters.

We are enjoying the baby Einstein DVDs . They arrived promptly, and in excellent condition. I would order again without reservation .
Am very pleased DVDs are in great shape.

We bought this set of DVDs from Costco when our grandson was an infant. The music is sometimes soothing, sometimes playful, sometimes moving. He loved them. As he got older he'd ask for them to be played over and over. Now he's 7-yrs-old and he watches them from YouTube from his iPad, but he still pulls out the DVDs now and again and puts them in the player. Those characters are like old friends. And each time I hear the opening Baby Einstein music I know the money for these DVDs was well-spent because of the hours of enjoyment he's gleaned from each DVD.
The box it came in was beat up and old, but the videos work great. The little girl loves the DVD's.

My little grandson LOVED these DVD's.  Though as a little one of just around 8 months, he had a limited attention span, they definitely captured his attention and he grew with them.  We could see a definite interest in him for the DVD's.  Good help for the little ones.  As a retired therapist and a grandmother, I would recommend them for enrichment and a bit of stretching of little minds that are eager to expand.
